website_summaries.verdict: Between Zero Belly’s popular chef-crafted recipes, simplicity, and focus on reducing belly fat, it’s easy to see why this weight loss cookbook is so popular.
pros: Over 150 easy and tasty low calorie recipes for losing weight and improving overall health
Examples include chicken and bean burritos, smoked salmon, and lasagna
cons: Some recipes include a fair amount of ingredients

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like this cookbook!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this cookbook! I bought the Zero Sugar diet book at the same time (that book I like) The recipes are NOT bad ones, just they require A LOT of different ingredients. I think its because so many different people contributed their recipes, there is a wide variety. I love the variety, but I don't want to have to buy a paste or 3 different spices that are only used in 1 recipe in the book. If your on a budget it gets very costly.
customer_reviews.author: Ocean blue

customer_reviews.title: It's not a diet!  It's a way of eating.
customer_reviews.text: First of all, we don't consider this a diet because we are never hungry. The guidance in this book has allowed us to follow a healthy eating style that has resulted in a 30 lb weight loss for my husband and 10 lbs for me! The recipes are easy to follow and we often have most ingredients on hand. I just completed my annual physical with significant improvements in cholesterol and glucose. Give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: BR

customer_reviews.title: I FEEL LIKE I AM IN MY EARLY THIRTIES AND HAVE A ...
customer_reviews.text: I AM 73 YEARS OLD I JUST HAD A TRIPLE BI-PASS16 MONTHS AGO.I WAS SPENDING 6 HOURS A DAY READING AND DOING NO PHYSICAL LABOR AND GOING TO BED AT EIGHT EVERY NIGH AND SLEEPING UNTIL EIGHT IN THE MORNING.IN TEN WEEKS I HAVE GONE FROM A SIZE FIFTY WAIST TO A SIZE 43 AND FROM 267 LBS.TO 217 LBS. I WENT FROM OLY BEING ABLE TO SHOVEL THREE SHOVELS OF DIRT TO SHOVELING 6 YARDS BY MYSELF IN LESS THAN AN HOUR I HAVE BEEN WORKING 17 HOURS A DAY DOING YARD WORK.I FEEL LIKE I AM IN MY EARLY THIRTIES AND HAVE A NEW LEASE ON LIFE.THANKS DAVID .
customer_reviews.author: peter waaas

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Incredible recipes- a must try is the pesto salmon! I have lost 17 lbs in 3 months just changing my eating habits yet still enjoying food!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Great belly busting recipes
customer_reviews.text: I have never been so pleased with a "health" cookbook as this I am with this one - it's a diet cookbook where the recipes don't taste especially diet. I didn't get it for the commentary or other instructions, just the recipes. Every recipe we have tried has been really good, and it does not feel like we are being deprived. We use it mostly for dinners but carb cravings have all but stopped! A few of the recipes I have made multiple times are vegetable lasagna, chicken tacos, vegetable tartlets, marinated shrimp on oats, plus the salad dressing, pesto and mayo. Looking forward to getting the other Zero Belly recipe books.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon frequent buyer

customer_reviews.title: Spectacular book!
customer_reviews.text: Spectacular book and delicious recipes! A great healthy way to cook that is still packed with tones of flavor! Currently, our favorite is the turkey meatballs over spaghetti squash! It's like a party in your mouth with all the flavors!!! Highly recommend this book to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: CBC

customer_reviews.title: want great recipes? This is the book
customer_reviews.text: want great recipes? This is the book. Want to eat healthy and find ways in which to cook properly without guilt? This is the book. Would recommend this to all who fit the above criteria
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: 70 year old likes this!
customer_reviews.text: Always interested in healthy eating plans. I may have corrupted his plan but now in a meal I look for "protein, fiber, and healthy fat". The recipes are for 4 and the portions seem small for me. But healthy snack and protein smoothie makes the eating plan easy.
customer_reviews.author: R. Howard

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have.
customer_reviews.text: Love the Zero Belly series as well as the Eat This Not That series as well. Already lost almost 25lbs! It's been a long time since I started losing real weight.
customer_reviews.author: scott warneck

customer_reviews.title: I love the recipes but hate the quality of the book
customer_reviews.text: I love the recipes but hate the quality of the book. I don't use it every day so I don't understand why it fell apart. All the pages are falling out. I contacted the publisher but never got a response. I have never had a cook book where all the pages fell out and I have a huge collection of cookbooks. So warning to everyone that the cook book will not stand up to use.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Tasty Recipes that work.
customer_reviews.text: I have the zero belly smoothie book. It has so many great recipes in it. After losing inches and pounds on the smoothie diet. The cookbook was a no brainer. I have my whole family is enjoying the wonderful recipes in this book. Once you choose healthy, and work so hard to get there. You need a cookbook like this, healthy food that tastes so good, there is nothing to miss from your old way of eating.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: I love all his books.
customer_reviews.text: A good cookbook. The recipes are good common food that doesn’t leave you hunting all over for ingredients. I read David’s “Zero Belly Diet” and started following it. So far I dropped 15lbs in 2weeks. Just the series to read if you are trying to sugar detox yourself.
customer_reviews.author: tech mom

customer_reviews.title: Recipes Redux
customer_reviews.text: Only if you have not bought the original book since many of the recipes are repeated!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as many recipes as I had imagined. Ingredients that are suggested are expensive where I live.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Burdick

customer_reviews.title: Nice and easy diet to follow
customer_reviews.text: It's a great program to follow when you have times to cook several times we day. I used it mainly for meal ideas and lost a few pounds. He gives good advice in the book
customer_reviews.author: Tzipora

customer_reviews.title: Gotta work at it
customer_reviews.text: Still learning and there is a lot to take in. Changes even a (thought) healthy eater. Lots of very good recipes. But again you have to want to re learn ur cooking habits and ingredients. But if we will it will be worth it. Good read. Interesting/boring at points but educational.
customer_reviews.author: BellaLuElla

customer_reviews.title: my new favorite cookbook
customer_reviews.text: Very Good book, used it probably 15 times in the short time I've own it. Actually going to sit & read it today. It has information about weight loss, not just recipes
customer_reviews.author: Del

customer_reviews.title: Great book!
customer_reviews.text: This book is one of my absolute favorites! The meals are exreamly easy to read and the instructions are very detailed. All the recipes in this book look absolutely amazing and are not filled any weird stuff like other healthy recipe books. I'm very pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Langwiser ☆

customer_reviews.title: Belly Fat no More
customer_reviews.text: This book is fantastic. I got it because I have IBS and this really helps with that., It also helps with looking a few pounds. the recipes are delicious and recommend for those wanting to loose the belly fat.
customer_reviews.author: pillows

customer_reviews.title: Great meals.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the meals in this cookbook. They do have a lot of ingredients and do take a bit of time to make, but they are very nice meals. My husband says they are restaurant quality meals. The spiced nut snack is awesome. The protein shakes are delicious and satisfying. Best of all, I know I am eating healthy!
customer_reviews.author: JoAnne TravelerTec

customer_reviews.title: Liked the discussion section prior to recipes
customer_reviews.text: Liked the discussion section prior to recipes, felt the premise was well explained. Was hoping for simpler recipes but these will allow for creativity. Nicely bound so will be durable.
customer_reviews.author: Knittenorma

customer_reviews.title: A bit difficult to follow and absorb all the knowledge ...
customer_reviews.text: A bit difficult to follow and absorb all the knowledge in this book but the recipies are so yummy. A bit hard for a full time mom to work all day than come home and cook for another hour but worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Barb Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A lot of recipes that fit the Zero Belly Diet plan. Lost 17 pounds in a month!
customer_reviews.author: Mike P

customer_reviews.title: Great recipes.
customer_reviews.text: his food actually tastes good. I have to follow gluten free and low carb. This is the best book I've found.
customer_reviews.author: CarolG.

customer_reviews.title: Flatter belly
customer_reviews.text: Awesome recipes. Husband did not know he was eating healthy food!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I found and few recipes in this book (Apple Breakfast ...
customer_reviews.text: I found and few recipes in this book (Apple Breakfast muffins) that have made it into regular cycle but few options for those that don't want to eat meat every day.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Plateau

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Easy to follow
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Easy to follow, tastes good, and I'm not hungry;) 10 pounds in 7 days, WooHoo!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara crawford

customer_reviews.title: Good Variety of Diet Options
customer_reviews.text: Great variety of diet options that don't always require hard to find ingredients. Author includes some personal stories which makes the recipes more interesting when trying to decide which to try out.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Live Longer, Healther!
customer_reviews.text: A "must have" for anyone who wishes to change their life and jumpstart their health without visiting the gym! The best companion to "The Zero Belly Diet" by same author.
customer_reviews.author: Appinhighlander

customer_reviews.title: YOU NEED THIS BOOK
customer_reviews.text: Same as all other zero belly books! Just amazing. If you want to get healthy...get this book!!! You can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Louise R Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: If you are a gormet cook, lovely book. I do not have most ingredients on hand nor do I desire to become a gormet chef. For me it was a waste of money. Someone else may love it. The weight loss plan irself is good.
customer_reviews.author: PammieK

customer_reviews.title: Feedback
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Shipped fast and great. Highly recommend seller. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Hewitt

customer_reviews.title: havent used yet, just got it recently
customer_reviews.text: I intend to use the cook book, but haven't so far. recipes look very good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good food philosophy
customer_reviews.text: Good food philosophy. If only we could all afford private chefs so we wouldn't have to rethink our food habits constantly ourselves.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Great Recipes!
customer_reviews.text: Has great recipes I focused more on what I liked than the zero calories.
customer_reviews.author: Fancy57

customer_reviews.title: Awesome book!!!
customer_reviews.text: This book has helped me lose more than 50 lbs. I feel better and have much more energy!!! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Luke S.

customer_reviews.title: All diets have their good and bad points
customer_reviews.text: Interesting reading. All diets have their good and bad points. Recipes are easy and most are pretty tasty. We'll see how is goes. Book was sent quickly and without damage.
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: Great recipes if you want to eat healthy but still want flavor
customer_reviews.text: I have increased my plant-based diet and was looking for more recipes. There are great tasting recipes in this book. The book arrived 10 days earlier than expected. It was in the condition as advertised. I would definitely buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Sybil

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: This cookbook offers a wide range of recipes. The diet and the exercise program work. What more can I say? Both my wife and I are using the information;
customer_reviews.author: raye highland

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love eating delicious food that doesn't add on the pounds
customer_reviews.author: JACOB A. PLICQUE

customer_reviews.title: Great foundation
customer_reviews.text: This book contains so many good and easy to make recipes to help get you started on a gluten and sugar free lifestyle.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Murray

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: tried most of the recipes and they are very good!!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These recipes are easy and delicious. Love my new book. Love the blueberry smoothie!
customer_reviews.author: J Madrid

customer_reviews.title: Awesome smoothies.
customer_reviews.text: Great recipes. Have used it 2 weeks now and I've lost 20 pounds. Feel Amazing.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It's nice to have a cookbook with easy healthy meals easy to make!
customer_reviews.author: aree cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Good recipes and easy to do. Very simple and delicious.
customer_reviews.text: Good recipes and easy to do. Very simple and delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Golf girl

customer_reviews.title: Good Book
customer_reviews.text: Sound advice and the theory is good... you just have to do it.
customer_reviews.author: desiree

customer_reviews.title: Zero Belly Cookbook
customer_reviews.text: I got this from the local library and saw so many recipes that I wanted to copy that I decided to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: julia

customer_reviews.title: I do not have a gluten sensitivity but this diet ...
customer_reviews.text: I do not have a gluten sensitivity but this diet (avoidance of gluten) has reduced my waist by 2 or 3 inches!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Mason

customer_reviews.title: There are some excellent recipes....
customer_reviews.text: ...and very few that I can't see myself making and enjoying. They aren't complicated and the fact I can make necessary items like the mayo, pesto, salsa without the usual major fuss of other "homemade" recipes is a real plus.
customer_reviews.author: Deb S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I don't buy many cookbooks anymore as I have so many, but this one was well worth it. Simple, everyday ingredients with a sensible plan and I love that there's a photo of every recipe. I feel much more motivated to cook a dish when I know what it's supposed to look like.
customer_reviews.author: Ahnna

customer_reviews.title: ... a few of the recipes and they are very good. Looking forward to trying more
customer_reviews.text: Have make a few of the recipes and they are very good. Looking forward to trying more.
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Didn't have as many recipes as I was hoping for and not a lot of variety.
customer_reviews.author: L. Tremmel

customer_reviews.title: Great reciepes!
customer_reviews.text: It has some g!reat recipes and does show calories for each portion, I do like that. A bit disorganized, but other than that I do like it! I am in the process of moving, so have not started yet
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne (Turner) Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Though a bit pandering, the overall set up of the diet helped me move towards a healthier life style.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha J

customer_reviews.title: but it has some good
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to follow at times and we aren't losing weight as quickly as advertised, but it has some good recipes
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recipes are very tasty and easy to make
customer_reviews.text: Recipes are very tasty and easy to make. Belly fat just seems to melt away. After several months though, pages have begun to shell out of binding. .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Recipes
customer_reviews.text: I haven't been following this diet close enough to speak to weight loss yet but every recipe I've made has been very tasty and easy.
customer_reviews.author: wilslm3

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good recipes, pretty easy to follow I am on my new journey to eat healthier.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda M. Browne

customer_reviews.title: Great cookbook for a healthy life
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to help me on my journey to eating healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael O.

customer_reviews.title: Liking it - just started
customer_reviews.text: I subscribe to his newsletter and have one of his earlier, smaller books. I have only sarted working through tis but it looks loaded with a lot of good information and recipes.

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Love the recipes in this cookbook. Super healthy and easy..

customer_reviews.title: Zero

customer_reviews.title: This is a staple cookbook
customer_reviews.text: Amazing cookbook. Food is delicious and easy to make. Best cookbook purchase and I highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I received product in record time and it was just as it was described! Love it!

customer_reviews.title: Good Book
customer_reviews.text: Good book - helps to have the information that goes along with the Zero Belly Diet Book.
customer_reviews.author: review sense

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The recipes are pretty good. Don't know if they will shrink my belly.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The mason jar salads have been a great addition to my lunch.

customer_reviews.title: The recipes look great. can't wait to try
customer_reviews.text: quickly read the "science" of the zero belly plan. The recipes look great. can't wait to try them

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got this cookbook to go along with the ...
customer_reviews.text: Glad I got this cookbook to go along with the Zero Belly book, it helps having it knowing you are eating Zero Belly foods takes the quests work out. All the recipes I have tried so far have been ones I will repeat.
customer_reviews.author: LO

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoy this book
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this book. The recipes are very tasty. I wish the app was available for Android devices as well as iPhones.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: have been so happy with this book. have really changed my eating habits and the meals are easy once you get use to it.
customer_reviews.author: don

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to understand and follow and it all taste good.
customer_reviews.author: Sheree Pintea

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a guide for healthy eating plan, not to lose a lot of weight. I love and live it!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: SUPER EASY TO FOLLOW
customer_reviews.text: SUPER EASY TO FOLLOW; NOTHING IS LEFT OUT; NICE TIE-IN TO ZERO BELLY SMOOTHIES & ZERO BELLY DIET. ANYONE SERIOUSLY CONTEMPLATING LOSING WEIGHT SHOULD HAVE THIS TRILOGY!
customer_reviews.author: Marty Ocker

customer_reviews.title: Food prep made easy - meals most enjoyable!!!
customer_reviews.text: Good planning and prep has become 'a dream come true' - this would make an ideal present for new bride or health enthusiast or somebody you care about and want them to 'live and eat right'!
customer_reviews.author: Melodie Van Wye

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am not a seafood fan. Too many of this type of recipes for me
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Some yummy recipes and good for you. This diet works.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ingredients are very expensive and it usually takes much longer than stated to prepare and cook.
customer_reviews.author: Mirwais Kaiwan

customer_reviews.title: Easy recipes. Works well with the new Weight Watchers ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy recipes. Works well with the new Weight Watchers "Smart Points".
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth It
customer_reviews.text: I was not impressed. Most of the recipes seemed very basic with obvious substitutions made. I could easily find these recipes for free on cooking websites so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!  Buy and enjoy
customer_reviews.text: What a great find. So glad a friend recommended. Worth reading the author's philosophy if you never tried a single recipe!
customer_reviews.author: TnRvrGal

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good ideas on fixing meals. I couldn't see myself adapting to these meals everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah  Hall

customer_reviews.title: Needs more recipes
customer_reviews.text: The book and recipes are great, I just wish there were more of them. Also more recipes or ideas for breakfasts if you don't have (or want to make) time to cook in the morning and you don't want overnight oats.
customer_reviews.author: jks.4688

customer_reviews.title: All the foods I love and can lose weight? Who knew.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best and only food regime anyone needs. Every receipt is not only appealing but keeps the ingredients simple so you don’t have to spend your whole paycheck to eat healthy, why would you want to do something different that is unproven, expensive, and hard to stick to. If you want to save your health and body try Zero Belly and you will never regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Techno Geek

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Delicious
customer_reviews.text: The recipes in this book are easy to make, do not take a long string of specialty ingredients, and taste good. This is an easy way to make a change.
customer_reviews.author: Mankea

customer_reviews.title: We make 5 recipes out of the book, not a major hit.
customer_reviews.text: Decent recipe book but out of all the recipes we might use 5? Some are not easy to make, requiring time, some just don't taste good to us but that is very subjective, we are all different people.. For us who both work is tough.
customer_reviews.author: C2Computer

customer_reviews.title: Healthy recipes that still allow you to have some chocolate ...
customer_reviews.text: Healthy recipes that still allow you to have some chocolate & red wine! The days that I eat recipes from this book only, I feel light and energetic. Some of my favorites so far are Turkey Meatballs, Classic Beef Burger and Spicy Popcorn!
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Cookbook
customer_reviews.text: Enjoying the recipes in this book but I may go broke trying to keep all the food fresh and stocked until I learn how to make the most of it. Don't have a zero belly yet but am sticking to it and hoping for the flat. Delivery was timely and without incident.
customer_reviews.author: Edit maniac

customer_reviews.title: on this diet that doesn't feel like a diet
customer_reviews.text: I have lost 50 lbs. on this diet that doesn't feel like a diet. This book just adds more great recipes in your arsenal against belly fat.
customer_reviews.author: lenny

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing.  THANK GOODNESS FOR ZEROBELLY!
customer_reviews.text: Thank goodness for Zero-belly. Lost 12 lbs in two weeks. And inches, inches, inches. However, the true benefit is how much better I feel. Inflammation is decreasing, no headaches, sleeping better. I don't need Alka Seltzer anymore. (Was taking almost nightly). Not taking Advil for aches and pains, headaches, etc. (2-4 sometime more daily) Absolutely amazing. THANK GOODNESS FOR ZEROBELLY! PS It's NOT a diet, it's a wonderfully, healthy way of life. Save your life, save your family's life .... ZEROBELLY!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: I have not had one that I do not like. The only downside that I see is that ...
customer_reviews.text: The recipes in this cookbook are delicious. I have not had one that I do not like.The only downside that I see is that they are time-consuming to make. On the positive side, I did lose weight in the first week.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Scafidi

customer_reviews.title: Good Book
customer_reviews.text: If you are ready to make a life change, really ready, then buy this book. The Diet book is a better investment, but the recipe book also has some good info. in it.
customer_reviews.author: Islandphoenix

customer_reviews.title: for someone like me on a strict budget
customer_reviews.text: its okay if you can afford the food, for someone like me on a strict budget, its hard to buy the food
customer_reviews.author: Linda C. Rudderforth

customer_reviews.title: Great Recipes
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cookbook with lots of yummy and easy recipes. I hope that they come up with another one with more tasty recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Simpson

customer_reviews.title: The recipes are clear and easy to create
customer_reviews.text: The recipes are clear and easy to create. Most of the ingredients would be found in most homes. The photos really help to sell the meals!
customer_reviews.author: Allen K

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful cookbook and a good way to introduce yourself to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful cookbook and a good way to introduce yourself to the Zero Belly Diet. I started using the recipes January 1st and have lost 2 inches from my belly and and 3 pounds. I am happy with the results so far. I have since purchased the actual diet book to better use the cookbook.
customer_reviews.author: Ann H.

customer_reviews.title: Inspiring, easy and simple.
customer_reviews.text: I liked how easy this was to read and how quickly he got to the point. The recipes seem easy and tasty. He brings up valid points and I'm excited to start his plan!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Try it! You will like it!
customer_reviews.text: The only problem I have with this cookbook is not enough time to cook. Great ideas. I haven't made all of the recipes but I plan to finish by the end of the year. Easy to follow recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Earl

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: appears to be basically gluten free diet but there are some interesting recipes...
customer_reviews.author: Pat N.
